readable.title: 2934359101_cdf57442dc
readable.content: A boxer is being examined in his corner by a member of his support team . A boxer with a red helmet has water sprayed into his mouth by his coach in the boxing ring . A man in a red helmet has water squirted in his mouth by another man in a boxing ring . A trainer giving water to a boxer in the corner . Man spraying water into boxer 's mouth .
